@asynccontextmanager
async def do_connect(server_coro: Callable[[DealerRouterSocket], Awaitable[
    None]], *args, endpoint: str='inproc://controller', client_class=
    HedgehogClient, **kwargs):
    async with start_dummy(server_coro, *args, endpoint=endpoint, **kwargs
        ) as dummy, connect_client(dummy, client_class=client_class) as client:
        yield client
return do_connect
pytest.fixture
